content.html: If you're going into performance review time, I highly recommend considering negotiating for more time rather than more money. A lot of companies are nervous about the economic climate. This could be your perfect opportunity to gain a 4-day workweek or more time off.
content.value:
If you're going into performance review time, I highly recommend considering negotiating for more time rather than more money.

A lot of companies are nervous about the economic climate. This could be your perfect opportunity to gain a 4-day workweek or more time off.
